item.title: Children can’t get over the parent’s limitations?!
item.description: The environment offered to the child is fundamental When parents have certain fears, limiting beliefs, children can’t be otherwise. They get the environment offered by adults, where they extract their information and behavior patterns.

item.title: Did you forget that you have a unique child? |Quick advice|
item.description: “Look at how well Emily wrote today, I see Samy is very good at football…” Thus begins, in the opinion of many parents, the motivation of the child.

item.title: Bold / Proactive Child or Good Child |Quick advice|
item.description: Bold / Proactive Child or Good Child? We meet different opinions about these skills. I want to have a bold child, so I allow him to behave with other people as he wishes.

item.title: Why are children stubborn? |Quick advice|
item.description: Why are children stubborn? Because they are logical, and we, the parents, are often inconsistent. They do not know about the rules that society has “given” to us as something pre-established.
